column2: Argentina was awarded a penalty after the referee saw a foul on Paredes on the VAR monitor. Messi then converted the spot kick
column3: sending it past Al Owais who had dived the wrong way. However
column4: the South American team had three further goals disallowed for offside in the first half. Saudi Arabia was unable to get a shot off in the first 45 minutes
column5: but they managed to score with both of their shots on target in the second half. Al Shehri equalised in the 48th minute after the ball deflected off Romero
column6: and Al Dawsari put Saudi Arabia in the lead with a curling shot. Al Owais made five saves in the game
column7: while substitute Al Amri cleared the ball off the line in the 92nd minute to secure a 2-1 win for his side.
